misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The code contains a hardcoded 'true' value, which can allow less-secure cipher suites to be accepted during SSL/TLS negotiation, potentially weakening the security of the communication.
recommendation: Ensure that the SSL/TLS negotiation process only accepts secure and strong cipher suites, and remove any hardcoded 'true' values that bypass this validation.
